title: Adelina Gomez Scholars Fund
description: To provide operating and student support for the Adelina Gomez Scholars Program for high school juniors to participate in the academic summer institute at UCCS and additional college preparatory programs.
marketingContent: To provide operating and student support for the Adelina Gomez Scholars Program for high school juniors to participate in the summer academic institute at UCCS and additional college preparatory programs.
